content.raw:
As of 0bcbb2e, the ABI is looking good to me, and the basic functionality is there, though I am still seeing some intermittent seg-faults (with `World::BuildSceneMsg` and when processing the `World::dirtyPoses`).

EDIT: these seg-faults are infrequent enough that I would be comfortable approving this and making an issue to track the failures.
